name: Person
title: Person
description: Demographics and administrative information about a person independent of a specific health-related context.

elements.name: Person
elements.description: Demographics and administrative information about a person independent of a specific health-related context.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Identifier for a person within a particular scope.

elements.name: name
elements.description: A name associated with the person.

elements.name: telecom
elements.description: A contact detail for the person, e.g. a telephone number or an email address.

elements.name: birthDate
elements.description: The birth date for the person.

elements.name: address
elements.description: One or more addresses for the person.

elements.name: photo
elements.description: An image that can be displayed as a thumbnail of the person to enhance the identification of the individual.

elements.name: managingOrganization
elements.description: The organization that is the custodian of the person record.

elements.name: active
elements.description: Whether this person record is in active use.

elements.name: link
elements.description: Link to a resource that concerns the same actual person.
